articles.description: Perfios has announced a buyback of ESOPs worth Rs 154 crore (approximately $18.5 million) from its 135 current and former employees.

articles.author: Nigel D'Souza
articles.title: JPMorgan’s bold forecast: India to become 3rd largest economy by 2027, reach $7 trillion by 2030 - CNBCTV18
articles.description: James Sullivan, the Managing Director of Asia Pacific Equity Research at JPMorgan sees Indian economy doubling to $7 trillion by 2030 with contribution from manufacturing rising to nearly 25% from 17% and exports doubling, to over a trillion dollars.
